resources.string: Enter a question you want to consult IChing with,and later you can save it.After casting,you can click on hexagrams\'s title to get reading

The I Ching (Wade-giles) also known as the Book of Changes,Classic of Changes;and Zhouyi, is one of hte oldest of the Chinese classic texts.The book contains a divination system comparable to Western geomancy of the West African Ifa system. In Western cultures and modern East Asia, it is still widely used for the purpose.
